problems.title: Problems
problems.subtitle: We explore merchants' expectations and potential problems to simplify their experience.

problem1.title: Value loss due to inflation
problem1.description: Merchants see how their sales in Argentine pesos lose value day by day due to inflation. They don't understand how to protect their income without changing how they collect.

problem2.title: Unnecessary technical complexity
problem2.description: Customers arrive at the store and cannot understand how to pay with cryptocurrencies. Everything seems complicated, they need wallets, technical knowledge, and end up abandoning the purchase.
